parts.text: {"word":"resuscitate","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人工呼吸や心臓マッサージなどで)蘇生させる、生き返らせる","english_definition":"to revive (someone) from apparent death or unconsciousness, typically by using artificial respiration and/or cardiac massage.","examples":[{"sentence":"The paramedics managed to resuscitate him at the scene.","translation":"救急隊員は現場で彼を蘇生させることに成功した。"},{"sentence":"They tried to resuscitate the drowning victim, but it was too late.","translation":"彼らは溺れた犠牲者を蘇生させようとしたが、手遅れだった。"},{"sentence":"The doctor resuscitated the patient after a cardiac arrest.","translation":"医師は心停止後、患者を蘇生させた。"}],"collocations":["resuscitate a patient (患者を蘇生させる)","attempt to resuscitate (蘇生を試みる)","successfully resuscitate (蘇生に成功する)","resuscitate someone from drowning (溺れた人を蘇生させる)","resuscitate someone from cardiac arrest (心停止から人を蘇生させる)"],"synonyms":["revive","restore","bring back to life","animate","reanimate"],"antonyms":["kill","deaden","extinguish"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(活動、事業、計画などを)復活させる、再活性化する","english_definition":"to revive or restore (something inactive or defunct).","examples":[{"sentence":"The government is trying to resuscitate the economy.","translation":"政府は経済を立て直そうとしている。"},{"sentence":"They are hoping to resuscitate the old theater with a new production.","translation":"彼らは新しい公演で古い劇場を再活性化することを望んでいる。"},{"sentence":"The company is attempting to resuscitate its failing business.","translation":"その会社は経営不振の事業を立て直そうとしている。"}],"collocations":["resuscitate the economy (経済を立て直す)","resuscitate a project (プロジェクトを復活させる)","resuscitate a business (事業を立て直す)","resuscitate interest in something (～への関心を再燃させる)"],"synonyms":["revive","regenerate","rehabilitate","rekindle","restore","re-establish"],"antonyms":["kill","destroy","suppress","abandon"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「resuscitare」（再び起こす、生き返らせる）に由来。接頭辞「re-」（再び）と「suscitare」（起こす、刺激する）から構成される。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/rɪˈsʌsɪteɪt/","syllables":"ri-sus-ci-tate"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["resuscitate","resuscitates"],"past_simple":"resuscitated","past_participle":"resuscitated","present_participle":"resuscitating"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**resuscitate**」は、主に医学的な文脈で、死にかけている人や意識を失っている人を蘇生させることを意味します。人工呼吸や心臓マッサージなどの処置によって、生命を回復させる行為を指します。比喩的には、衰退した経済や事業、失われた関心などを再び活性化させるという意味でも使われます。フォーマルな単語であり、日常会話よりも専門的な場面で用いられることが多いです。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ They resuscitated the plant with water.","correct":"✓ They revived the plant with water.","note":"植物を生き返らせる場合は、一般的に「revive」を使う方が自然です。「resuscitate」は主に人や動物に対して使われます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He was resuscitated back to life.","correct":"✓ He was resuscitated.","note":"「resuscitate」自体に「生き返らせる」という意味が含まれているため、「back to life」を付け加えるのは冗長です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["resuscitation (名詞: 蘇生、人工呼吸)","resuscitator (名詞: 蘇生器、人工呼吸器)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency) - 専門用語に近い。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**resuscitate**」は、死にかけている人や意識を失っている人を、人工呼吸や心臓マッサージなどの方法で生き返らせることを意味する、やや専門的な単語です。また、比喩的に、衰退したものを再び活性化させるという意味でも使われます。医学やビジネスなどの分野でよく用いられます。日常会話ではあまり使われませんが、ニュース記事や専門書などで見かけることがあります。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The firefighters were able to **resuscitate** the cat after it was pulled from the burning building.","translation":"消防士たちは、燃えている建物から救出された猫を蘇生させることができた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"蘇生させる (動物)"},{"sentence":"The government hopes to **resuscitate** the tourism industry after the pandemic.","translation":"政府はパンデミック後、観光産業を立て直すことを望んでいる。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"復活させる (産業)"},{"sentence":"The doctor used a defibrillator to **resuscitate** the patient's heart.","translation":"医師は除細動器を使って患者の心臓を蘇生させた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"蘇生させる (心臓)"}]}
